Name: Pizza Bike Rider
About the game: You are a pizza bike delivery boy. Your goal is to deliver pizzas to the client as fast and as hot as you can without letting the time run out. If the delivery (pizza) will be cold, you will lose the game so hurry up and get it done while it's still hot, you will get a huge tip! The road is full of traffic and you have very less time to deliver the pizza. Only someone who can take his ride to its extremes can deliver the pizza on time. But be aware the road is full of fast moving vehiclesCome Take the pizza Bike challenge if you Dare.Whether you are the lover of Free Pizza, Bikes, Cars, Car racing, Bike Racing, Bike Race or motorcycle games for Kids, boys and girls or games similar to these themes you are going to love this game. As a pizza boy, you want to get your job as quickly as possible. You can Enjoy your ride by jumping from the on the trucks while delivering these pizza's in dirt roads ! Features: * Ride in different worlds * Many interesting tracks for each world to make stunts and to ride. * Cool stunts * Beautiful graphics by the best designers. Get it now and Enjoy!
Developers: Enaayah Software Development and Services Private Limited
